title: # 285 - Moshe Kasher & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Moshe Kasher and we talk about Moshe's book, Moshe's Justin Bieber story, bad sex stories, Moshe's uber story, and much more!

Make sure you check out Moshe Kasher and Natasha Leggero's new stand up special "The Honeymoon Stand Up Special" on Netflix now!

 

This episode is brought to you by eHarmony. Get one month free by signing up for 3 months at www.eharmony.com and using the code “Bert” at checkout.  

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $125 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com  
To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
